title: Underunderstood: The 9/11 Hoax That Wasn't
dc:creator: WBUR
description: While we’re busy stuffing our faces over Thanksgiving, we thought we’d share a story you’ll love from another great podcast: Underunderstood. They look into a photo that frequently goes viral on Reddit to figure out, once and for all, whether or not it’s a hoax. Their conclusion is satisfying and weirdly touching.
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: Underunderstood: The 9/11 Hoax That Wasn't

media:content.media:description: A frequently circulated viral photo, which shows a smiling kid in front of one of the burning World Trade Center towers (courtesy Underunderstood)
